content: It's really a great app, except I have to reset it for no ads every single time I use it
app works beautifully and everything just works.

Switched to this Premium app as when using headphones with roku remote, we get too much static, which is a known problem I've discovered. This app, which controls roku on my tv great, but I've connected my headphones to my phone (Pixel 5) via a headphone adapter, as there is no Jack, but can't get sound.  Sounds still with tv. Can't reach app developer, so can't get any help. I'm told my approach should work. . Guess I'll ask for a refund unless I can get a reply from developer.
replyContent:
Hi, we apologize for any issue you might be having! Our application doesn't support private listening. The premium version gives access to use the app without ads.
Please contact our customer support at Contact@realvision.app for more details.
Thank you.

content: Does everything they said and it's easy simple and always with you
great remote no ads premium is worth it

We've forwarded your feedback to our developers. Thank you for taking out the time to send us your suggestions!

content: Doesn't even turn on the TV. You also can't change the buttons. I only downloaded this because my physical remote quit working.
replyContent: Thank you for downloading our app! It's your TV that is not configured for that, if you want to turn on your TV with this app, you should configure your TV for that enabling the fast TV start by going to:Settings-->System-->Power-->Fast TV start (Enable) Enjoy it!

content: Just bought it last month n now doesn't work. I unpaired w my TV to see if that works...nope. Now it can't even find any device. No help or complain button on app. Also, can't turn TV on. Have to do that manually.
replyContent: Thank you for downloading our app! Be sure that your TV is correctly connected in the same Network that your phone. If you want to turn on your TV with any remote app, you should configure your TV for that enabling the fast TV start by going to: Settings-->System-->Power-->Fast TV start (Enable) Enjoy it!
